title: The Value of Victory?
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Yeah! I win! I’m the winner~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Noooo~! I lost again~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>That's a winning streak for me. Wanna keep going?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rushing like the wind! The Yellow Cat Rin won't be discouraged by something like this, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Like the wind... what? Well, whatever. I’ll play with you as much as you want.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>I won, nya~!! Hooray, hooray~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>H-Hey, it’s just one win! I’ve been winning way more!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>For the Yellow Cat Rin, this one victory is worth a thousand victories, nya...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wait, what’s that supposed to mean!? What’s this Yellow Cat Rin thing? Explain!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
